Title: Ctrl Shift - MCP & A2A - Why Business Leaders Should Care
Author: John Savill's Technical Training
Description:
In this first episode of Ctrl Shift, tech trends changing business, we explore will business leaders should care about Model Context Protocol (MCP) and Agent to Agent (A2A).
